channel.title: Please help my fix player has killed player

item.title: Please help my fix player has killed player
item.dc:creator: @shadow43 shadow43
item.description:
@shadow43 wrote:

I get some error

It would be great if you would write it all correct. I’l tryed something like this:

killerz.yell(p.playerName+" has killed “+playerName+” and get 1PK Point.");

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 04, 2009, 02:25:45 pm[/size][hr]so how to write it correct???

item.title: Please help my fix player has killed player

item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

[quote=“shadow43, post:1, topic:302950”]So I’m using 317 source delta. it have to say something like this: Player has killed player1
So mines code is bad please somebody fix it for me :

	killerz.yell(playerName+" has killed "+playerName+" and get 1PK Point.");

thank you for helping me.[/quote]

instead of yell put sM

item.title: Please help my fix player has killed player
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

[quote=“shadow43, post:1, topic:302950”]So I’m using 317 source delta. it have to say something like this: Player has killed player1
So mines code is bad please somebody fix it for me :

	killerz.yell(playerName+" has killed "+playerName+" and get 1PK Point.");

thank you for helping me.[/quote]

This isn’t actually going to help you… But it’s “and got 1 PK point!” not ang get 1PK point.
